member.name: T:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeViewSelectionMode
member.summary: Selection mode for the treeview.
member.remarks: The Selection mode determines how treeview nodes can be selected.

member.name: F:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeViewSelectionMode.SingleSelect
member.summary: Only one node can be selected at a time.

member.name: F:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeViewSelectionMode.MultiSelect
member.summary: Multiple nodes can be selected at the same time without restriction.

member.name: F:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeViewSelectionMode.MultiSelectSameRootBranch
member.summary: Multiple nodes that belong to the same root branch can be selected at the same time.

member.name: F:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeViewSelectionMode.MultiSelectSameLevel
member.summary: Multiple nodes that belong to the same level can be selected at the same time.

member.name: F:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeViewSelectionMode.MultiSelectSameLevelAndRootBranch
member.summary: Multiple nodes that belong to the same level and same root branch can be selected at the same time.

member.name: F:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeViewSelectionMode.MultiSelectSameParent
member.summary: Only nodes that belong to the same direct parent can be selected at the same time.

member.name: T:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeNodeEventHandler
member.summary: Delegate used for tree node events.

member.name: T:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeView
member.summary: The TreeView control is a regular treeview with multi-selection capability.

member.name: F:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeView.components
member.summary: Required designer variable.

member.name: F:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeView.blnInternalCall
member.summary: Used to make sure that SelectedNode can only be used from within this class.

member.name: F:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeView.htblSelectedNodes
member.summary: Hashtable that contains all selected nodes.

member.name: F:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeView.blnSelectionChanged
member.summary: Track whether the total SelectedNodes changed across multiple operations for SelectionsChanged event

member.name: F:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeView.htblSelectedNodesOrigColors
member.summary: Hashtable to preserve Node's original colors (colors can be set on the TreeView, or individual nodes) (GKM)

member.name: F:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeView.tnNodeToStartEditOn
member.summary: Keeps track of node that has to be pu in edit mode.

member.name: F:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeView.blnWasDoubleClick
member.summary: Remembers whether mouse click on a node was single or double click.

member.name: F:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeView.tnMostRecentSelectedNode
member.summary: Keeps track of most recent selected node.

member.name: F:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeView.tnSelectionMirrorPoint
member.summary: Keeps track of the selection mirror point; this is the last selected node without SHIFT key pressed. It is used as the mirror node during SHIFT selection.

member.name: F:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeView.intMouseClicks
member.summary: Keeps track of the number of mouse clicks.

member.name: F:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeView.selectionMode
member.summary: Selection mode.

member.name: F:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeView.selectionBackColor
member.summary: Backcolor for selected nodes.

member.name: F:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeView.blnNodeProcessedOnMouseDown
member.summary: Keeps track whether a node click has been handled by the mouse down event. This is almost always the case, except when a selected node has been clicked again. Then, it will not be handled in the mouse down event because we might want to drag the node and if that's the case, node should not go in edit mode.

member.name: F:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeView.tnToFlash
member.summary: Holds node that needs to be flashed.

member.name: F:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeView.tnKeysStartNode
member.summary: Keeps track of the first selected node when selection has begun with the keyboard.

member.summary: Occurs when a tree node is added to the SelectedNodes collection.

member.summary: Occurs when a tree node is inserted to the SelectedNodes collection.

member.name: M:CodersLab.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedNodes_TreeNodeRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode)
member.summary: Occurs when a tree node is removed from the SelectedNodes collection.

member.summary: Occurs when the SelectedNodes collection was cleared.

member.summary: Unselects all selected nodes.

member.summary: Unselects all selected nodes that don't belong to the specified level.
member.param: Specifies the action that caused the selection change.

member.summary: Unselects all selected nodes that don't belong directly to the specified parent.
member.param: Specifies the action that caused the selection change.

member.summary: Unselects all selected nodes that don't belong directly or indirectly to the specified parent.
member.param: Specifies the action that caused the selection change.

member.summary: Unselects all selected nodes, except for the specified node which should not be touched.
member.param: Specifies the action that caused the selection change.

Specifies the action that caused the selection change.
member.returns: True if node was selected, false if not.
